channel.title: Wondering in twisted space and time
channel.description: Wondering in twisted space and time

item.title: My new blog
item.description:
Hello, twisted spacetime

This is my new blog system, which is still under construction. In this space, I will talk about Scheme, Linux, and other related topics, these will record my adventure into Schemer's land.x

For integrating these things, these tools are used:

  • emacs
  • org-mode
  • org-static-blog
  • language-tool
  • emacs langtool
  • git
